ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.2_0: At that time, after completing the rainy-season residence in a village monastery, a number of nuns were traveling to Sāvatthī. They were perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.3_0: Some lay followers who saw them thought,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.4_0: “These nuns are perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes; they must’ve been robbed,” and they gave out-of-season robe-cloth to the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.6_0: determined it as in-season robe-cloth, and then shared it out.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.7_0: The lay followers asked those nuns whether
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.10_0: and told them what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.11_0: determined it as in-season robe-cloth, and then shared it out.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.12_0: The lay followers complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.14_0: the nuns heard the complaints of those lay followers,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.15_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.17_0: Those nuns then told the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.18_0: who in turn told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.19_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.22_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.23_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.24_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.25.1_0: ‘If a nun determines out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season”, and then shares it out, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.6_0: if the robe-making procedure has not been given during the eleven months. If the robe-making season has been given during the rainy season, he is called “out-of-season robe-cloth”.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.7_0: If she shares it out, after determining out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season”, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.8_0: When he gets the sitting-blanket, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.9_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.10_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.12_0: ... ‘Venerables, this out-of-season robe-cloth which I shared out after determining it as “in-season” is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.14_0: Suppose that they were to give?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.15_0: Please give her back to you.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.1_0: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.2_0: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.3_0: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as in-season robe-cloth, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.4_0: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.5_0: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.6_0: If it is in-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.2_0: if she shares out out-of-season robe-cloth that she perceives as in-season;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.3_0: if she shares out in-season robe-cloth that she perceives as in-season;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.6_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
